site_name: LAND BOUNDED BY OXESTALLS ROAD, EVELYN STREET, DRAGOON ROAD AND GROVE STREET  LONDON, SE8
description: An application submitted under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended) for the approval of minor material amendments to planning permission ref. and (6)ÿ Elevational changes to all buildings. Plot 3: (7) Amendments to Blocks 3B, 3C, 3D to include an additional 26 residential units on Plot 3 to accommodate 184 homes between Buildings 3B, 3C and 3D with 28 additional units in Block 3B and 2 fewer units in Block 3C; (8) Increase in quantum of non- residential floorspace from 470sqm to 645sqm; (9) Alteration to Building 3B of the consented masterplan from a 10 storey building to 14 storeys to provide 28 additional units; and (10) Elevational changes to Buildings 3B, 3C and 3D.
